import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { BookServiceService } from '../book-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-bookby-id', templateUrl: './bookby-id.component.html', styleUrls: ['./bookby-id.component.css'] }) export class BookbyIDComponent implements OnInit { book:any; id:any; constructor(private bookservice:BookServiceService, private url:ActivatedRoute){} ngOnInit(): void { } }
